#summary Progress notes for Fr-Sky telemetry support
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

= Telemetry =

There are a number of "all-in-one" transmitter/telemetry solutions on the market, including those from [http://jetimodel.com/index.php?page=products&old=0&category=4 JETI] and [http://www.frsky-rc.com/Products.asp?BigClassID=17 Fr-Sky], plus a number of stand-alone solutions including the amazing FPV-empowering [http://www.eagletreesystems.com/ Eagle-Tree] gear and even DIY systems employing things like SparkFun's [http://www.sparkfun.com/categories/111 XBee] modules, teamed up with an [http://diydrones.com/profiles/blogs/ardupilot-mega-home-page ArduPilot-Mega] for example.


== So why [http://www.frsky-rc.com/Products.asp?BigClassID=17 Fr-Sky]? ==

Well, local tests have shown the brand to be very reliable, robust and functional to date. Additionally, this kit is very economically priced AND the working protocols are freely published by the manufacturer. This all makes for an ideal match with the gruvin9x open source project. 

(The author has not personally experienced the JETI product, though it seem quite popular also.)

= Progress to Date =

Details of progress to date can be found on the [FrSky] wiki page.
